name: Melffy Pony
text: If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), or this card is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: You can return this card to the hand, then you can add 1 Level 2 or lower Beast monster from your GY to your hand, except "Melffy Pony". During your End Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Melffy Pony" once per turn.
